--- title: Stateful Workflow with Checkpointing --- flowchart TD Start([New Application]) --> LoadState{Load State
from DB} LoadState -->|Not Found| CreateState[Create New State
Status: PENDING] LoadState -->|Found| CheckStep{Current
Step?} CreateState --> Step1Check{Step 1
Complete?} CheckStep -->|PENDING| Step1Check CheckStep -->|EXTRACTING| Step1Check CheckStep -->|VALIDATING| Step2Check CheckStep -->|ENRICHING| Step3Check CheckStep -->|COMPLETE| Done CheckStep -->|FAILED| ErrorHandle Step1Check -->|No| Step1[Extract Documents
LLM Call] Step1Check -->|Yes| Step2Check Step1 -->|Success| Save1[Save Checkpoint
Status: VALIDATING
Data: extracted_data] Step1 -->|Error| RecordError1[Record Error
Status: FAILED
Error Count++] Save1 --> Step2Check{Step 2
Complete?} Step2Check -->|No| Step2[Validate Data
LLM Call] Step2Check -->|Yes| Step3Check Step2 -->|Success| Save2[Save Checkpoint
Status: ENRICHING
Data: validation_result] Step2 -->|Error| RecordError2[Record Error
Status: FAILED
Error Count++] Save2 --> Step3Check{Step 3
Complete?} Step3Check -->|No| Step3[Enrich Data
LLM Call] Step3Check -->|Yes| Done Step3 -->|Success| Save3[Save Checkpoint
Status: COMPLETE
Data: enriched_data] Step3 -->|Error| RecordError3[Record Error
Status: FAILED
Error Count++] Save3 --> Done([Workflow Complete]) RecordError1 --> ErrorCheck1{Error Count
> 3?} RecordError2 --> ErrorCheck2{Error Count
> 3?} RecordError3 --> ErrorCheck3{Error Count
> 3?} ErrorCheck1 -->|Yes| AlertOps1[Alert Ops Team
Manual Intervention] ErrorCheck2 -->|Yes| AlertOps2[Alert Ops Team
Manual Intervention] ErrorCheck3 -->|Yes| AlertOps3[Alert Ops Team
Manual Intervention] ErrorCheck1 -->|No| CanRetry1[Can Retry Later
State Preserved] ErrorCheck2 -->|No| CanRetry2[Can Retry Later
State Preserved] ErrorCheck3 -->|No| CanRetry3[Can Retry Later
State Preserved] AlertOps1 --> ErrorHandle([Error - Needs Review]) AlertOps2 --> ErrorHandle AlertOps3 --> ErrorHandle CanRetry1 --> ErrorHandle CanRetry2 --> ErrorHandle CanRetry3 --> ErrorHandle style Step1 fill:#87CEEB style Step2 fill:#87CEEB style Step3 fill:#87CEEB style Save1 fill:#90EE90 style Save2 fill:#90EE90 style Save3 fill:#90EE90 style Done fill:#90EE90 style RecordError1 fill:#FFB6C1 style RecordError2 fill:#FFB6C1 style RecordError3 fill:#FFB6C1 style AlertOps1 fill:#FF6B6B style AlertOps2 fill:#FF6B6B style AlertOps3 fill:#FF6B6B
